headline.main: For Dieters With a Sweet Tooth, Scientists Offer New Choices

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AMERICANS who are concerned about fitness and weight are on the verge of gaining a far wider choice of low-calorie sweeteners even as a highly competitive search goes on for a perfect sugar substitute.
docs.snippet: LEAD: AMERICANS who are concerned about fitness and weight are on the verge of gaining a far wider choice of low-calorie sweeteners even as a highly competitive search goes on for a perfect sugar substitute.

headline.main: A Little Compassion For the Overweight

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: If Karon Cooney really did not appreciate fat jokes and had listened when former fat people told her how unhappy they were while being fat, then she could not advocate the prejudicial treatment of fat individuals she writes of in her essay ''Solutions to the Fat Problem'' (Opinion page, Aug. 6).
docs.snippet: LEAD: If Karon Cooney really did not appreciate fat jokes and had listened when former fat people told her how unhappy they were while being fat, then she could not advocate the prejudicial treatment of fat individuals she writes of in her essay...
